channel.title: Getting Jdk and Classpaths [Vista]
channel.description: Hello, I really need some help downloading JDK and setting the Path / Classpath for a Vista, I have done this before on Windows XP but never on Vista. I have tried downloading JDK on my computer but couldn't find the file after I downloaded it. There use to be a tutorial on creating a server for Vista but I couldn't seem to find it using the search. If someone could help me out that would be really great and appreciated. Thank you for your time.
